revision.comment: Updated to match Sega Model 2 Emulator v0.9 but missing some SHA-1 information.
Added ROMs that were missing from the release yesterday.
Updated to match SEGA Model 2 Emulator v0.7 (added model2 and waverunn).
Now using Generic XML for CMPro + RC3.
Added full header information. The rest of the content is unchanged though!
Updated to match SEGA Model 2 Emulator v0.6 (added dyndek2b, manxtt, dynmcopc).
Fixed wrongly named game (dyndeka -> dyndeka2).
Updated to match SEGA Model 2 Emulator v0.5 (added motoraid).
Upload on 8 April did not include the new RomCenter data file!
Updated cloneof for doab, dynmcopb and pltkidsb.
Updated to match SEGA Model 2 Emulator v0.4.
Removed MAME supplements.
No change required for MAME v0.111.

No change required for MAME v0.109.
